arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ
english: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak what is good or keep silent.

arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ
english: Actions are only by intentions.

arabic: لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
english: None of you will believe until you love for your brother what you love for yourself.

arabic: الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ
english: Religion is sincerity.

arabic: اتَّقِ اللَّهَ حَيْثُمَا كُنْتَ، وَأَتْبِعِ السَّيِّئَةَ الْحَسَنَةَ تَمْحُهَا، وَخَالِقِ النَّاسَ بِخُلُقٍ حَسَنٍ
english: Fear Allah wherever you are, and follow up a bad deed with a good deed and it will wipe it out, and behave towards the people with a good character.

arabic: الْمُؤْمِنُ الْقَوِيُّ خَيْرٌ وَأَحَبُّ إِلَى اللَّهِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِ الضَّعِيفِ، وَفِي كُلٍّ خَيْرٌ
english: A strong believer is better and is more lovable to Allah than a weak believer, and there is good in everyone.

arabic: مَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقًا يَلْتَمِسُ فِيهِ عِلْمًا سَهَّلَ اللَّهُ لَهُ طَرِيقًا إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ
english: Whoever follows a path in pursuit of knowledge, Allah will make easy for him a path to Paradise.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لاَ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى صُوَرِكُمْ وَأَمْوَالِكُمْ، وَلَكِنْ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَأَعْمَالِكُمْ
english: Allah does not look at your appearances or your wealth, but He looks at your hearts and your actions.

arabic: لاَ تَغْضَبْ
english: Do not become angry.

arabic: الْبِرُّ حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ، وَالإِثْمُ مَا حَاكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ وَكَرِهْتَ أَنْ يَطَّلِعَ عَلَيْهِ النَّاسُ
english: Righteousness is good character, and sin is that which wavers in your heart and which you would hate for people to know about.

arabic: الرَّاحِمُونَ يَرْحَمُهُمُ الرَّحْمَنُ، ارْحَمُوا مَنْ فِي الأَرْضِ يَرْحَمْكُمْ مَنْ فِي السَّمَاءِ
english: The merciful will be shown mercy by the Most Merciful. Be merciful to those on the earth and the One in the heavens will have mercy upon you.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ رَفِيقٌ يُحِبُّ الرِّفْقَ، وَيُعْطِي عَلَى الرِّفْقِ مَا لاَ يُعْطِي عَلَى الْعُنْفِ
english: Allah is Kind and He loves kindness, and He rewards for kindness what He does not reward for harshness.

arabic: عَجَبًا لأَمْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِ إِنَّ أَمْرَهُ كُلَّهُ خَيْرٌ، وَلَيْسَ ذَاكَ لأَحَدٍ إِلاَّ لِلْمُؤْمِنِ
english: How wonderful is the affair of the believer, for his affairs are all good, and this applies to no one but the believer.

arabic: مَنْ نَفَّسَ عَنْ مُؤْمِنٍ كُرْبَةً مِنْ كُرَبِ الدُّنْيَا نَفَّسَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُ كُرْبَةً مِنْ كُرَبِ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
english: Whoever relieves a believer of some worldy distress, Allah will relieve him of some of the distress of the Day of Resurrection.

arabic: يَسِّرُوا وَلاَ تُعَسِّرُوا، وَبَشِّرُوا وَلاَ تُنَفِّرُوا
english: Make things easy and do not make things difficult, and give glad tidings and do not repel people.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ إِذَا عَمِلَ أَحَدُكُمْ عَمَلاً أَنْ يُتْقِنَهُ
english: Allah loves that when one of you does a job, he does it with excellence (itqan).

arabic: الطُّهُورُ شَطْرُ الإِيمَانِ
english: Purity is half of faith.

arabic: خَيْرُكُمْ مَنْ تَعَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ وَعَلَّمَهُ
english: The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.

arabic: مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَىَّ وَاحِدَةً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَشْرًا
english: Whoever sends blessings upon me once, Allah will send blessings upon him tenfold.

arabic: إِنَّ الدِّينَ يُسْرٌ
english: Indeed, the religion is easy.

arabic: مَنْ بَنَى لِلَّهِ مَسْجِدًا بَنَى اللَّهُ لَهُ بَيْتًا فِي الْجَنَّةِ
english: Whoever builds a mosque for Allah, Allah will build for him a house in Paradise.

arabic: لاَ تَدْخُلُونَ الْجَنَّةَ حَتَّى تُؤْمِنُوا وَلاَ تُؤْمِنُوا حَتَّى تَحَابُّوا
english: You will not enter Paradise until you believe, and you will not believe until you love one another.

arabic: الْيَدُ الْعُلْيَا خَيْرٌ مِنَ الْيَدِ السُّفْلَى
english: The upper hand (that gives) is better than the lower hand (that takes).

arabic: كُلُّ مَعْرُوفٍ صَدَقَةٌ
english: Every good deed is charity.

arabic: تَبَسُّمُكَ فِي وَجْهِ أَخِيكَ لَكَ صَدَقَةٌ
english: Your smiling in the face of your brother is charity for you.

arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
english: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Know that victory comes with patience, relief comes with affliction, and with hardship comes ease.

arabic: مَا أَصَابَ عَبْدًا هَمٌّ وَلاَ حَزَنٌ فَقَالَ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي عَبْدُكَ
english: No person suffers any anxiety or grief, and then says the supplication 'O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant...' except that Allah will remove his grief and replace it with joy.

arabic: لاَ تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَنَا
english: The Prophet (ﷺ) said to Abu Bakr: Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us.

arabic: أَحَبُّ الأَعْمَالِ إِلَى اللَّهِ أَدْوَمُهَا وَإِنْ قَلَّ
english: The most beloved of deeds to Allah are those that are most consistent, even if they are small.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
english: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to say: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from weakness and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness.

arabic: مَنْ تَوَكَّلَ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
english: Whoever puts his trust in Allah, He will be sufficient for him.
